metadata.title: Lip Shaped Pillow | Decorative Lip Shape Soft Cushion Bed Sofa Plush Throw Pillow Valentines Day Gifts (Red)
features: üíùSuper comfortable to hold and Hug! Made from high quality polypropylene cotton, super soft and durable, easy to wash and clean.
üíùFashionable and Adorable! Multiple cute design and shapes, adorable Sun, loving Hearts, pastel Rainbow Cloud, and playful lips
üíùThe Perfect conversation piece to decorate your living space, bedroom, sofa, car, chairs, home office! Express your unique personality and mood!
üíùPerfect gift! For your friends and loved ones. Great for all occasions, Valentine's day, Christmas, Birthday, Wedding, Anniversary, special events and much more!
üíùSize: Heart Shape 18 inches x 15 inches, Lip Large 23 inches x 12 inches, Sun Shape 23 inches, Rainbow Cloud 21 inch x 14 inch (approximately).
description: *100% brand new, high quality, soft and comfortable. *Perfect for home, bedroom, living room, office, playroom, great Holiday and Christmas decoration.
*Material: Plush+ PP cotton. *Size: Heart Shape 18 inches x 15 inches, Lip Large 23 inches x 12 inches, Sun Shape 23 inches, Rainbow Cloud 21 inch x 14 inch (appoxmiatley) *Color: Multi-Color

*There will be 1-3 cm normal minor deviation due to manual measurement.*The picture is of actual products. Please allow minor color difference due to different light and monitor setting.*Due to compressed packaging and stuffed PP cotton, after opening the package please allow brief moment for the pillow to restore back to it's normal shape.
